name: VR Forest
description:
You're alone in a forest with only a flashlight.

- VR ONLY -

Made this in 2 weeks as a intro to VR type project.  It was originally going to be a scary / spooky horror thing, but was unsure how to make it scary.  Original idea was to have a jumpscare but decided against it.  Got tired of working on it and want to start a real project so here it is.  I might make changes to it later in an attempt to make it actually scary.
